negotiator.boaframework.opponentmodel.nash

Class IssueEvaluationList

  • java.lang.Object
    • negotiator.boaframework.opponentmodel.nash.IssueEvaluationList

  • public class IssueEvaluationList
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages all the issue evaluations and provides easy methods to access and change them. Another important function of this class, is that it calculates the normalized weights for each issue(evaluation). This weight is the estimated importance for each issue.
    Author:
    Roland van der Linden

      • addIssueEvaluation

        public void addIssueEvaluation(AIssueEvaluation ie)

      • updateIssueEvaluation

        public void updateIssueEvaluation(int issueID,
                                  Value offeredValue)
        This method will receiveMessage a single issueEvaluation.
        Parameters:
        issueID - The issueID of the issueEvaluation that should be updated.
        offeredValue - The offered value for that issue.

      • updateIssueWeightMap

        public void updateIssueWeightMap()
        This method will receiveMessage the issueWeightMap. It will first calculate the total unnormalized weight of the issues, and then normalize it by calculating the percentage that each issue has of the total weight. Note that if the total weight is zero, we have a special case in which all issues receive equal weights.

      • getIssueEvaluation

        public AIssueEvaluation getIssueEvaluation(int issueID)

        Parameters:
        issueID - The unique ID of the issueEvaluation.
        Returns:

        This method returns the estimated weight for the issue with the given ID.
        Parameters:
        issueID - The issueID of the issue for which we want to know the estimated weight.
        Returns:
